identity_group_id.description: The identity group id references the identity group that contains all informations (phone, notes, etc.). Many identities may belong to this group. If the identity group id is null, it means that identity does not have a group and any extra information. Please refer to identity groups API for more informations.

color.description: Color of the icon: Default: 0 Blue: 1 Green: 2 Turquoise: 3 Purple: 4 Yellow: 5 Orange: 6 Red: 7 Asphalt: 8 Grey: 9

intervention_messages_boost.description: Priority boost of messages with intervention

get.description: This method renders attachments ordered by creation date (descending).

parameters.description: The record index to start. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The max number of records to return. Default value is 30, max value is 150.
parameters.name: limit

post.description: This method allows you to create an new attachment.

422.description: Compose is not supported on this source (compose_disabled_on_source)

post.description: This method creates a new folder. In case of success it renders the created folder, otherwise an error (422 HTTP code).

parameters.description: Folder’s label (mandatory).
parameters.name: label

parameters.description: ID of the parent folder.
parameters.name: parent_id

parameters.description: position of the folder.
parameters.name: position

parameters.description: query of the folder as described in ​Search API documentation.​\n\nExample: “​active_and_assigned_to_me:true”
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: boolean describing display of the number of threads.
parameters.name: render_threads_count

parameters.description: list of roles allowed to see this folder. This parameter has to be a hash otherwise it will raise a 400 error. The key should be "only". For example: `&role_restriction[only][]=4e5596cdae70f677b5000002`
parameters.name: role_restriction[only][]

parameters.description: list of teams allowed to see this folder. Same thing as role_restriction: team_restriction parameter has to be a hash with the key "only".
parameters.name: team_restriction[only][]

delete.description: This method destroys an existing folder. It renders the folder itself. It renders a 404 if id is invalid.

get.description: This method renders a folder from given id.
get.summary: Getting a folder from its id

parameters.name: query

parameters.description: boolean describing display of the number of threads.
parameters.name: render_threads_count

parameters.description: list of roles allowed to see this folder. This parameter has to be a hash otherwise it will raise a 400 error. The key should be "only". For example: `&role_restriction[only][]=4e5596cdae70f677b5000002`
parameters.name: role_restriction[only][]

parameters.description: list of teams allowed to see this folder. Same thing as role_restriction: team_restriction parameter has to be a hash with the key "only".
parameters.name: team_restriction[only][]

parameters.name: sort

get.description:
This method renders a role from given id.

Authorization​: only users that can manage roles.
get.summary: Getting a role from its id

put.description:
This method updates an existing role from given attributes and renders it in case of success.

Authorization​: A user can’t update roles with more permissions than himself and can’t give a role a permission he doesn’t have.

Any permission updated with a user that does not have this permission will be ignored (The update is done, just not the unallowed permission)

This method renders users ordered by creation date (descending).

Authorization​: only users that can view users. If the user affiliated to the token has the manage_users_of_my_teams permission, only the users belonging to at least one of the teams he’s the leader of will be returned.

post.description: This method creates a new user. In case of success it renders the created user, otherwise, it renders an error (422 HTTP code).

parameters.description: User list of category ids (multiple).
parameters.name: category_ids[]

parameters.description: User email (mandatory).
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Whether the user is enabled or not (boolean).
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: User external id, used for SSO.
parameters.name: external_id

parameters.description: User firstname (mandatory).
parameters.name: firstname

parameters.description: User gender ("man" or "woman").
parameters.name: gender

parameters.description: User list of team ids (multiple).
parameters.name: team_ids[]

parameters.name: timezone

parameters.description: List of locales corresponding to the languages spoken by the user (multiple).
parameters.name: spoken_languages[]

post.description:
This method invites a new user. In case of success it renders the created user, otherwise, it renders an error (422 HTTP code).

Authorization​: only users that can invite other users. If the user affiliated to the token has the manage_users_of_my_teams permission, the invited user will need to belong to at least one of the teams he’s the leader of. It will not be possible to assign the user to other teams.

parameters.description: User list of category ids (multiple).
parameters.name: category_ids

parameters.description: User email (mandatory).
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Whether the user is enabled or not (boolean).
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: User external id.
parameters.name: external_id

parameters.description: User firstname (mandatory).
parameters.name: firstname

parameters.description: User gender ("man" or "woman").
parameters.name: gender

parameters.name: identity_ids

parameters.description: User lastname (mandatory).
parameters.name: lastname

parameters.description: Language for the user interface.
parameters.name: locale

parameters.description: User nickname.
parameters.name: nickname

parameters.description: User role id (mandatory).
parameters.name: role_id

parameters.description: User list of team ids (multiple).
parameters.name: team_ids

parameters.description: Use the timezone endpoint to get the timezone name (String), default is empty for
parameters.name: timezone

parameters.description: List of locales corresponding to the languages spoken by the user (multiple).
parameters.name: spoken_languages

delete.description:
This method deletes the given user. In case of success it renders the deleted user, otherwise, it renders an error (422 HTTP code).

Authorization​: only users that can update users. The user affiliated to the token must have at least all the permissions of the other user. If the user affiliated to the token has the manage_users_of_my_teams permission, the deleted user will need to belong to at least one of the teams he’s the leader of.

get.description: This method renders a user from given id.
get.summary: Getting a user from its id

put.description:
This method updates users from given attributes and renders it in case of success.

Authorization​: only users that can update users. If the user affiliated to the token has the `manage_users_of_my_teams` permission, the updated user will need to belong to at least one of the teams he’s the leader of. The teams the user affiliated to the token is the leader of will be the only ones which can be added or removed.

parameters.description: User list of category ids (multiple).
parameters.name: category_ids[]

parameters.description: User email.
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Whether the user is enabled or not (boolean).
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: User external id, used for SSO.
parameters.name: external_id

parameters.description: User firstname.
parameters.name: firstname

parameters.name: gender
